name: Russian Offroad Jeep Simulator - Drive your SUV in Russian Taiga!
name_original: Russian Offroad Jeep Simulator - Drive your SUV in Russian Taiga!
description:
Drive your jeep through dangerous Russian taiga!
Do you like dirt, race and offroad terrains as much as we do? So, it is time to try our simulator Russian Offroad Jeep Simulator. Drive a Russian truck, race, upgrade your SUV and explore the taiga. Complete different missions full of offroad spirit. Race to feel the power of Russian jeep. Drive without roads, climb hills, fight with taiga. A great simulator for real men!

Have you ever been to Russian Taiga? No? This SUV simulator is for you. No, seriously.

Try to drive in the taiga, race your truck and be accurate! Russian guys don't like waiting.

In this simulator every SUV has unique offroad abilities. Find the best way to race through taiga for each truck, turn on low gear, lock differential if you stuck and need to get out. Upgrade to drive better. Use a navigation map to find a destination point. Race and explore offroad terrains with mud, hills and other obstacles. Drive like a professional taiga driver with our simulator, good roads are for girls.
This simulator is not easy. But... You aren't afraid of taiga difficulties, huh? Just drive! Or buy a new truck and drive faster. It is more than truck simulator. It is like a Russian reality simulator.

Features of Russian Offroad Jeep Simulator:
- Offroad taiga terrains
- Difficult race missions
- Different views
- 4 types of Russian SUV
- Truck upgrade
- Unique offroad abilities
- Great 3D graphics
- Real sounds

Good news. With this simulator you can race even if you can't drive in real life. And even you don't have a SUV. Enjoy offroad atmosphere, become a truck driver.

Today is the best day to buy an SUV and drive to taiga for a real race.
Try our Russian Offroad Jeep Simulator.
Race with us and face cool adventures!
